name: pricks002
description: This one afternoon at work, in between carding people coming to the beer garden, I doodled caricatures of the people in the neighborhood. This person is every non-guy stranger I confided in over drinks and/or during ciggie breaks, strangers who'd encourage me to keep growing into a more emotionally resilient and independent person. I drew this as though it's my mental health journal speaking to me, giving me the next steps to manifest. Up the down-to-earth punks, for real.
